definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 26:5 vintage (cf. [[בָּחַר]])—[[בְּחִיר]] Le 26:5 + 4 t. + Zec 11:2 Qr (but rd. [[בחור]] Kt); cstr. [[בְּחִיר]] Ju Jdg 8:2; sf. [[בְּחִירֵח]] Je 48:32; —vintage, lit. Le 26:5, Le 26:5, Ju Jdg 8:2, Is 32:10, Je 48:32; in simile Is 24:13, Mic 7:1; Zec 11:2 rd. [[בחור]] (Kt) and cf. sub [[בָּחַר]].
